plot: Shelley Bennett takes us on a bizarrely funny journey from the Midwest to the Middle East. Along the way she encounters a cast of quirky characters who reflect the bigotry, guilt and loathing that affect us all in a post 9-11 world.
title: Shame on Shelley Bennett
plot_es: Shelley Bennett takes us on a bizarrely funny journey from the Midwest to the Middle East. Along the way she encounters a cast of quirky characters who reflect the bigotry, guilt and loathing that affect us all in a post 9-11 world.
plot_en: Shelley Bennett takes us on a bizarrely funny journey from the Midwest to the Middle East. Along the way she encounters a cast of quirky characters who reflect the bigotry, guilt and loathing that affect us all in a post 9-11 world.
